channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ NVIDIA Research on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Fast Encoder-Based 3D from Casual Videos via Point Track Processing
item.description: TRACKSTO4D: Fast & accurate 3D reconstruction from casual videos using 2D point tracks, drastically reducing runtime by up to 95% while matching state-of-the-art accuracy.

item.title: GaussianMarker: Uncertainty-Aware Copyright Protection of 3D Gaussian Splatting
item.description: GaussianMarker: A novel uncertainty-aware watermarking method ensures robust copyright protection for 3D Gaussian Splatting assets, invisibly embedding messages into model parameters and extractable …

item.title: Large Spatial Model: End-to-end Unposed Images to Semantic 3D
item.description: Large Spatial Model (LSM) achieves real-time semantic 3D reconstruction from just two unposed images, unifying multiple 3D vision tasks in a single feed-forward pass.

item.title: Self-Taught Recognizer: Toward Unsupervised Adaptation for Speech Foundation Models
item.description: STAR, a novel unsupervised adaptation framework, drastically improves automatic speech recognition (ASR) robustness across diverse domains using only unlabeled data and outperforms existing self-train…
